thread.section_title: ProBikeKit (Australia) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ProBikeKit (Australia) | probikekit.com.au
thread.title: robert hill

author: robert hill
title: robert hill
text:
I've been a long time ProBikeKit customer usually I got my order shipped to Australia from the UK within 5-8 days
It's now been 3 weeks and I'm still waiting
I wrote to customer service asking about this only to be told it can take up to 30 days to come.
Well if that is the new norm I will not be dealing with them again
I've bought stuff from wiggle and ribble and it always arives within 7 to 9 days
Not a happy customer
